rows.label: qev087303_MSG0002
rows.name: S-Secretary Nagi? What are you doing here...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087303_MSG0004
rows.name: What matters is you're alive. It's Marla, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087303_MSG0006
rows.name: Are you the only one being held here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087303_MSG0007
rows.name:
Grismore and Campbell are dead.
The Prone beat them senseless...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087303_MSG0010
rows.name: Please, sir. You have to...save Orton...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087303_SEL0011
rows.name: Swear to avenge Marla, no matter the cost.

rows.label: qev087303_SEL0021
rows.name: Vow to get Orton home safe.

rows.label: qev087303_MSG0015
rows.name:
I understand the sentiment, but we have more
important things to worry about than revenge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087303_MSG0016
rows.name: She's right. Rescuing Orton must remain our top priority.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087303_MSG0017
rows.name:
Yes. For Marla's sake as much as his.
We owe it to them both.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087303_MSG0019
rows.name:
Once we have Orton, I'll be back for you.
We're all going home together.[ST:wait ]
